attribute: .ClinVar_Variant_Id | .[] | select(.colocated_variants != null) | .colocated_variants[] | select(.var_synonyms != null) | .var_synonyms | select( .ClinVar != null ) | select(.ClinVar != []) | .ClinVar[] | select(contains("VCV")) | sub("VCV0+"; "") | {"ClinVar_Variant_Id": . }

."Rat Gene Identifier"[] | { "name_key": .name_key, "name": .name, "primaryKey": .primaryKey, "searchKey": "{gene} (Rno)" } | . + { "searchKey": .searchKey | ascii_downcase, "name_key": .name_key | ascii_downcase } |  select( .name_key == .searchKey) | { "Rat Gene Identifier": .primaryKey }

."Mouse Gene Identifier"[] | { "name_key": .name_key, "name": .name, "primaryKey": .primaryKey, "searchKey": "{gene} (Mmu)" } | . + { "searchKey": .searchKey | ascii_downcase, "name_key": .name_key | ascii_downcase } |  select( .name_key == .searchKey) | { "Mouse Gene Identifier": .primaryKey }

."Zebrafish Gene Identifier"[] | { "name_key": .name_key, "name": .name, "primaryKey": .primaryKey, "searchKey": "{gene} (Dre)" } | . + { "searchKey": .searchKey | ascii_downcase, "name_key": .name_key | ascii_downcase } |  select( .name_key == .searchKey) | { "Zebrafish Gene Identifier": .primaryKey }
[.results[] |  select(.species != null) | select ( .species | contains("Xenopus laevis")) | .modCrossRefCompleteUrl][0] | { Frog_General_Xenbase_Database_url: .}

.ensembl_protein_id | .results[] | .uniProtKBCrossReferences[] | select ( (.properties[].value | contains("{Ensembl Gene Id}"))) | select( .id | contains("{Ensembl_Transcript_Id}")) | .properties[] | select ( .key == "ProteinId" ) | { ensembl_protein_id: .value }

.uniprot_isoform_id | .results[] | .uniProtKBCrossReferences[] | select ( (.properties[].value | contains("{Ensembl Gene Id}"))) | select( .id | contains("{Ensembl_Transcript_Id}")) | { uniprot_isoform_id: .isoformId }

.protvar_protein_api_reference_function_uri | .inputs[] | select ( .inputStr == "{hgvs_variant} {protein}").derivedGenomicInputs[] | select ( .inputStr == "{hgvs_variant} {protein}").mappings[].genes[] | select ( .ensg | contains ("{Ensembl Gene Id}")).isoforms[] | { protvar_protein_api_reference_function_uri: select( .accession == "{uniprot_id}").referenceFunctionUri }

.[] += ("{ensembl_vep_vcf_string}" | split("-") | {"vcf_string": .}) | .[] | select( .chrom == ("chr" + .vcf_string[0]) and .vcf_string[1] == .pos and .vcf_string[2] == .ref and .vcf_string[3] == .alt and .transcript =="{Ensembl_Transcript_Id}") | { "ditto": .ditto }
